item.title: The Slow Trek to Pelican
item.description: Update: Please see below for two solutions. I have grown increasingly unhappy with Wordpress lately. My blog is simple. My design tastes are simple. My needs are simple. I like control. I am a geek. And I really need an excuse to learn Python, which seems to be rapidly growing into one of the most important programming languages for a data analyst. I have decided to migrate this blog over to Pelican, a static site generator written in Python.
